Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: A team must have a Scrum Master assigned

Name: worker_availability_gt_80
Description: Worker availability must be greater than 80%

Name: sprint_duration_lte_4_weeks
Description: Sprint duration must be 4 weeks or less

Name: user_story_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: A User Story must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: feature_in_backlog_has_priority
Description: A Feature in the backlog must have a priority set

Name: blocker_must_have_severity
Description: A Blocker must have a severity level defined

Name: sprint_goal_defined
Description: A Sprint must have a defined goal

Name: task_effort_gt_0
Description: A Task must have an effort greater than 0

Name: velocity_based_on_min_1_sprint
Description: Velocity calculation must be based on at least one sprint
